title: Evenepoel, Vingegaard, Vine, Kras All Suffer Fractures, Roglič Escapes Without Breaking Bones
content:
UPDATED: High-speed crash at Itzulia Basque Country leaves trail of fractured bones, cuts, scrapes, and a punctured lung across several teams, but no life-threatening injuries.

Read the full article at Evenepoel, Vingegaard, Vine, Kras All Suffer Fractures, Roglič Escapes Without Breaking Bones on Velo.
author: ahood
